member.name: T:ocarina_calculator.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ocarina_calculator.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ocarina_calculator.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:ocarina_calculator.Main.CalculateVolume(System.Double,System.Double)
member.returns: DOUBLE - The Volume of the Ocarina.

member.name: M:ocarina_calculator.Main.CalculateTotalThickness(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates total thickness of the clay.
member.param: The base frequency of the Ocarina.

member.name: M:ocarina_calculator.Main.CalculateTotalOpenArea(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates total open area on the Ocarina.
member.returns: DOUBLE - Total open area of the Ocarina.

member.name: M:ocarina_calculator.Main.CalculateDiameter(System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the diameter for a hole.
member.returns: DOUBLE - The area of the hole.

member.name: M:ocarina_calculator.Main.CalculateStepFrequency(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the frequency of a note by the number of steps it takes.
member.param: The number of steps higher the note to calculate is.
member.returns: DOUBLE - The frequency of the new note.

member.name: M:ocarina_calculator.Main.Calculate_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This calculates the Ocarina hole diameter.

member.name: M:ocarina_calculator.Main.HelpBttn_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This button shows a window of how to use the program properly.

member.name: M:ocarina_calculator.Main.Equations_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This button shows the equations used in the program, or other equations that never got used but still work.

member.name: M:ocarina_calculator.Main.Reset_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This button resets the window in case someone funks up inputting numbers.
